about_the_game:
FBI Agent Briana Walker is looking for some redemption. A failed sting operation has led to some of her teammates getting injured and the escape of famous drug runner Gianna Silva. Upon discovering that Gianna traded her final shipment of contraband for a souped-up Ford Mustang, the team deduces that Gianna has probably escaped to Los Angeles to join the underground illegal racing and drifting community to try to win her money back there. Briana decides to go undercover and investigate the subculture by trying to join the “Long Beach Lionesses” a famous underground lesbian racing community. On this adventure Briana meets beautiful lesbian women and becomes involved with LA’s underground illegal racing and drifting subculture.

“The Fast and the Flirtatious: LA Drift” is a Yuri Dating Sim that delves into the LA underground racing and drifting subculture but also explores the thriving lesbian dating scene that flourishes in this community.


- Fast cars
- Lovely lesbians
- A gripping storyline
- RnB and West Coast Fusion Soundtrack
- Multiple romanceable women

content_descriptors.notes: Given the game explores the underground subculture of drifting and illegal racing, these criminal acts are portrayed somewhat positively. The main character is an undercover FBI agent so there is frequent talk about drug trafficking and other criminal behaviours. Since this is also a dating sim, there is frequent consumption of alcohol on dates. There is frequent talk about adult romantic relationships between women (lesbian relationships).
